name: G.H.O.S.T. Hunters: The Haunting of Majesty Manor
name_original: G.H.O.S.T. Hunters: The Haunting of Majesty Manor
description:
G.H.O.S.T. Hunters: The Haunting of Majesty Manor is a game developed by Aisle 5 Games. It was originally released in 2007. Aisle 5 Games published the game.
You can play G.H.O.S.T. Hunters: The Haunting of Majesty Manor on PC.
